sourcesContent:
export const projects = [
  {
    title: "STM32 SPI/I2C Firmware",
    description:
      "Communication drivers for external sensors using STM32 HAL with DMA optimization and low-power modes.",
    image: "https://images.pexels.com/photos/163100/circuit-circuit-board-resistor-computer-163100.jpeg?auto=compress&cs=tinysrgb&w=400",
    github: "https://github.com/SHAHEER-DASTGIR/stm32-spi-i2c",
    demo: "",
    stack: ["STM32", "C", "SPI", "I2C", "DMA"],
  },
  {
    title: "Linux Device Driver",
    description:
      "Simple character driver for data logging with proper error handling and kernel module best practices.",
    image: "https://images.pexels.com/photos/546819/pexels-photo-546819.jpeg?auto=compress&cs=tinysrgb&w=400",
    github: "https://github.com/SHAHEER-DASTGIR/linux-driver",
    demo: "",
    stack: ["Linux", "C", "Kernel", "Driver"],
  },
  {
    title: "ESP32 IoT Sensor Hub",
    description:
      "Modular ESP32 firmware with FreeRTOS for multi-sensor data acquisition, BLE provisioning, and MQTT connectivity.",
    image: "https://images.pexels.com/photos/442150/pexels-photo-442150.jpeg?auto=compress&cs=tinysrgb&w=400",
    github: "https://github.com/SHAHEER-DASTGIR",
    demo: "",
    stack: ["ESP32", "FreeRTOS", "MQTT", "BLE", "C/C++"],
  },
  {
    title: "RISC-V Verification",
    description:
      "Hardware verification testbenches for RISC-V CPU design using UVM-SV methodology and industry-standard tools.",
    image: "https://images.pexels.com/photos/159201/circuit-circuit-board-resistor-computer-159201.jpeg?auto=compress&cs=tinysrgb&w=400",
    github: "https://github.com/SHAHEER-DASTGIR",
    demo: "",
    stack: ["RISC-V", "UVM-SV", "Verilog", "SystemVerilog"],
  },
];
